attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the EU reform treaty agreed on 23 June 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Public were told by Tony Blair there would be a referendum on the EU Treaty. He has now gone back on that promise in the last days of his premiership. We should be allowed our say on Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
